description: Send and manage SMS, iMessage, and RCS messages from your workflows. Track delivery, retrieve message details, cancel pending sends, and check contact capabilities. Verify account status and configure webhooks to receive message events. Get an API key from Blooio.com

capabilities.name: me
capabilities.description: Get current API key details and validation status.

capabilities.name: send_message
capabilities.description: Send a single text or attachment message (queues outbound iMessage/SMS).

capabilities.name: cancel_message
capabilities.description: Cancel a queued or scheduled message.

capabilities.name: contact_capabilities
capabilities.description: Check if a contact supports iMessage/SMS/RCS.

capabilities.name: webhook_set
capabilities.description: Update the webhook URL for receiving message events.
